QuestData.Title: Raising Spirits
QuestData.Description: Our race's gift of shamanism stirred me from a years-long lethargy. Now I provide for all here, crafting the same boons that gave me newfound strength.$B$BThe Highland raptors are cunning and fierce beasts. Their spirits can grant our warriors great strength. Bring me raptor eyes, so I may make the amulets as Tor'gan taught me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 10 Highland Raptor Eyes from Highland Striders or Highland Thrashers.
QuestData.CompletionText: The fierceness in the eyes of the raptors will be matched by those of our warriors.
QuestData.RewardText: The lethargy that overcame me even after the camps fell was so strong, I refused this gift when it was first given to me.$B$BNow, I am proud to do my part in the name of the Horde.
